Body: Possible Duplicate:  Google Play allows publishers to respond to users' comments?  It appears that Google is allowing some developers to respond to Google Play application comments. Here is a blog post explaining the feature. Let's assume I posted a comment on an app and the developer responded to me. How does it look like ? How can I acknowledge the fact that he responded ?  Do I get a notification ? An email ? Nothing ?
Title: Where can I see if a developer responded to my comment on the Google Play?

history.Text: It appears that Google is allowing some developers to respond to Google Play application comments. Here is a [blog post explaining the feature.][1] Let's assume I posted a comment on an app and the developer responded to me. How does it look like ? How can I acknowledge the fact that he responded ?  Do I get a notification ? An email ? Nothing ?   [1]: http://android-developers.blogspot.fr/2012/06/replying-to-user-reviews-on-google-play.html
Where can I see if a developer responded to my comment on the Google Play?

Here is a [blog post explaining the feature.][1] Let's assume I posted a comment on an app and the developer responded to me. How does it look like ? How can I acknowledge the fact that he responded ?  Do I get a notification ? An email ? Nothing ?   [1]: http://android-developers.blogspot.fr/2012/06/replying-to-user-reviews-on-google-play.html
